original_text: Then the mystery was revealed to Daniel in a vision of the night. Then Daniel blessed the God of heaven.
korean_text: 이에 이 은밀한 것이 밤에 환상으로 다니엘에게 나타나 보이매 다니엘이 하늘에 계신 하나님을 찬송하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the mystery was revealed to Daniel
in a vision of the night.
Then Daniel blessed the God of heaven.
